sentences.en: A restricted import quota was set for meat products.
sentences.cn: 肉类产品设定了进口配额.

sentences.en: Be sure you get your daily quota of calcium.
sentences.cn: 要确保每天的钙摄入量。

sentences.en: Cannot allocate database object - database would exceed its disk quota.
sentences.cn: 不能分配数据库对象 —— 数据库将超过它的磁盘限额.

sentences.en: Each has his quota of work for the day.
sentences.cn: 每个人都有一份当天的工作.

sentences.en: Each member of the club was given his quota of tickets to sell for the party.
sentences.cn: 俱乐部的每一会员分到了为那游艺会而售卖的一部分门票.

sentences.en: How to keep and increase the quota of sale of the hotel?
sentences.cn: 如何才能够保持并增加酒店的销售额 呢 ?

sentences.en: Most stars probably have their quota of planets, meteorids, comets, and asteroids.
sentences.cn: 多数恒星也许还拥有若干行星 、 流星 、 彗星和小行星.

sentences.en: No boat is allowed to catch more than its quota of fish.
sentences.cn: 任何船都不允许捕获超过限量的鱼.

sentences.en: The government has decided to scrap quotas on car imports.
sentences.cn: 政府决定取消汽车进口配额。

sentences.en: The highway construction quota is a significant foundation for the whole system.
sentences.cn: 公路工程施工定额是整个公路工程定额体系的重要基础.

sentences.en: The quota of four tickets per person had been reduced to two.
sentences.cn: 每人可购买的票的限额已经由四张降至两张。

sentences.en: There are plans to introduce strict immigration quotas.
sentences.cn: 有计划要推行严格的移民限额制度。

sentences.en: These are not the only production teams that have overfulfilled the output quota.
sentences.cn: 超产的不单是这几个生产队.

sentences.en: They have the usual quota of human weaknesses, no doubt.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问，他们身上也有人所共有的弱点。

sentences.en: to introduce a strict import quota on grain
We must fix the daily work quota for your men.
sentences.cn: 我们也必须改变你们的工作强度.

sentences.en: Workers do all they can to fulfill the production quota.
sentences.cn: 工人们奋力实现生产指标.

phrases.tran_cn: 生产指标；生产限额；生产配额；生产预计额
n. 配额制；定额分配制
销售配额；销售限额；目标销售额

trans.tran_cn: （正式限定的）定量，定额，配额，指标
trans.tran_en: an official limit on the number or amount of something that is allowed in a particular period
